short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 4YouSee Chrome player for Digital Signage is a complete solution to manage your Corporate TV or Digital Media Out of Home project.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
4YouSee Chrome player for Digital Signage is a complete solution to manage and monitor your Corporate TV or Digital Media Out of Home (Digital Signage) project. It is versatile, lightweight and stable. It has the most advanced management features for Digital Out of Home networks and provides support for numerous media formats and templates to capture the most of your target audience. Try our software for free for 14 days: http://www.4yousee.com/register/?lang=en_US

You can also use 4YouSee Designer, our outstanding digital signage content creation tool, to create menu boards, templates and interactive content.

With 4YouSee's solutions you can:
- Create content that delight your customers, fast and with low cost!
- Manage your schedule with agility and flexibility, anywhere. 
- Play your content in various screens types, stable and reliable! 
- Analyze the results of Digital Media Out Of Home in real-time!
